title: CRM Starter Pack
description: Generate a functional CRM MVP with auth, customers, and search.

prompts.title: App Scaffold
prompts.body: Build a modern CRM app using React + Tailwind + Supabase. Features: auth, dashboard with sidebar, customer records (name,email,phone,company,notes), table view with search & filter, add-new button.

prompts.title: Add/Edit Customer Form
prompts.body: Create a form with fields: name (required), email (required, validate), phone, company, notes. Include Save and Cancel buttons.

prompts.title: Database Integration
prompts.body: Connect to Supabase. Customers table: id, name, email, phone, company, notes, created_at. Insert/update on submit; fetch & render in table.

prompts.title: Search & Filter
prompts.body: Add a search bar that filters customers by name, email, or company (case-insensitive) and updates results in real time.

title: Landing Page Pack
description: Spin up a clean SaaS landing quickly.

prompts.title: App Scaffold
prompts.body: Build a SaaS landing page using Next.js + Tailwind. Sections: hero (headline+CTA), features grid, pricing table, testimonials, footer with contact form.

prompts.title: Hero Section
prompts.body: Create a hero with large headline, subheadline, and 'Get Started' button. Responsive, gradient background.

prompts.title: Pricing Table
prompts.body: Add 3 pricing tiers with features and CTA; highlight the Pro tier as recommended.

prompts.title: App Scaffold
prompts.body: Build a booking system with Next.js + Tailwind + Supabase. Auth, booking calendar, user create/view/cancel, admin approve/reject.
prompts.preview: Build a booking system with auth + calendar. (Pro pack preview)

prompts.title: Booking Form
prompts.body: Form: date & time picker, service type dropdown, notes; save to Supabase.

prompts.title: Calendar View
prompts.body: Calendar shows bookings; booked slots red, available green; hover for details.
